title.@value: Urge incontinence associated with pelvic organ prolapse

definition.@value: A condition of the urinary system, caused by detrusor dysfunction. This condition is characterised by urinary incontinence that accompanies detrusor hyperreflexia when a specific bladder volume is reached, leakage of urine, lack of urge to urinate, or lack of awareness of bladder filling.

label.@value: Urge incontinence associated with pelvic organ prolapse
